Michael,

shouldn't this behaviour be regarded as a bug?

In Heritrix' p=
roject.properties all source/target versions are set to 
"1.4" (however, ma=
ven.test.target is missing!). So, the expected behavior for 
jspc would als=
o be to compile just fine under 5.0 as a 1.4 compatible class.
Unfortunatel=
y, these properties are not passed to jspc/jasper...
